    • Method Detail

      • getAllPlayerData

        IPlayerStockData[] getAllPlayerData()
        Get all online player data
        Returns:
        An array of IPlayerStockData for all online players

      • getPlayerData

        IPlayerStockData getPlayerData(java.util.UUID uuid)
        Get an online player's data
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the player
        Returns:
        The player's IPlayerStockData

      • getPlayerData

        IPlayerStockData getPlayerData(java.lang.String playerName)
        Get an online player's data
        Parameters:
        playerName - The name of the player, returned from HumanEntity.getName()
        Returns:
        the player's IPlayerStockData

      • savePlayerData

        java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Boolean> savePlayerData(IPlayerStockData playerStockData)
        Save an instance of IPlayerStockData for a player. The Future.isDone() will return true immediately if using flat file
        Parameters:
        playerStockData - The player data to save for the player
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • getOfflinePlayerData

        java.util.concurrent.Future<IPlayerStockData> getOfflinePlayerData(java.util.UUID uuid)
        Get an offline player's IPlayerStockData. The Future.isDone() will return true immediately if using flat file or if it is still cached
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the player
        Returns:
        A Future which will return the IPlayerStockData or null if none exists

      • getOfflinePlayerData

        java.util.concurrent.Future<IPlayerStockData> getOfflinePlayerData(java.lang.String name)
        Get an offline player's IPlayerStockData. The Future.isDone() will return true immediately if using flat file or if it is still cached
        Parameters:
        name - The player's username
        Returns:
        A Future which will return the IPlayerStockData or null if none exists
